sqlMap.select: select a.CZY_DJXH as czyDjxh,a.GW_DJXH as oldGwDjxh,a.SS_JGBM as ssJgbm,a.ZJBZ as zjbz,a.QX_JGBM as qxJgbm from QY_RY_GW a where a.CZY_DJXH=#czyDjxh# and a.GW_DJXH=#oldGwDjxh#
sqlMap.update: update QY_RY_GW set CZY_DJXH=#czyDjxh#,GW_DJXH=#gwDjxh#,SS_JGBM=#ssJgbm#,ZJBZ=#zjbz#,QX_JGBM=#qxJgbm# where CZY_DJXH=#czyDjxh# and GW_DJXH=#oldGwDjxh#
update QY_RY_GW set CZY_DJXH=#czyDjxh#,GW_DJXH=#gwDjxh#,SS_JGBM=#ssJgbm#,ZJBZ=#zjbz#,QX_JGBM=#qxJgbm# where CZY_DJXH=#czyDjxh# and GW_DJXH=#gwDjxh#
sqlMap.delete: delete from QY_RY_GW where CZY_DJXH=#czyDjxh# and GW_DJXH=#oldGwDjxh#
delete from QY_RY_GW where CZY_DJXH=#czyDjxh# and GW_DJXH=#gwDjxh#
